intro.title: Learn by Doing, Test Like an Interview
intro.description: This app is designed to help you prepare for real technical interviews. You can practice without pressure, or challenge yourself in interview mode with real constraints.

practice_mode.title: Practice Mode
practice_mode.subtitle: Learn, Understand, Improve
practice_mode.description: Practice Mode is designed for learning and deep understanding.
list: You answer questions without time limits
You can take your time, rethink, and learn at your own pace
practice_mode.important: Completed stages in Practice Mode do NOT affect your statistics. This mode is purely for learning and preparation.

interview_mode.title: Interview Mode
interview_mode.subtitle: Simulate a Real Interview Experience
interview_mode.description: Interview Mode recreates the pressure of a real technical interview.
list: Each question has a strict time limit
If time runs out, the answer is counted as incorrect
You do not see whether your answers are correct until the entire stage is completed
Once the session starts, you must finish it to see your results
interview_mode.tests: This mode tests not only knowledge, but also:

randomization.title: Question Pool & Randomization
randomization.subtitle: Always a New Challenge
randomization.description: Each stage contains more than 10 questions.
randomization.footer: This prevents memorization and encourages real understanding. Every attempt is a new challenge.

statistics.title: Statistics & Progress
statistics.subtitle: Track What Matters
statistics.description: Your statistics are calculated only from Interview Mode.
